resources.string: Bleed: Applies bleed to enemy, which reduces their HP over time. Increases crit rate by 30%. Effect lasts for 3 turns.\nCooldown: 5 turns
Frenzy: Reduces resistances to 0 and increases ATK based off of reduced resistance for 3 turns.\nCooldown: 5 turns
Enhance: Buffs ATK and resistances for 2 turns.\nCooldown: 4 turns
Block: Blocks incoming attacks for 2 turns.\nCooldown: 4 turns
Life Steal: Deals a weak attack and in return heals for 8 HP.\nCooldown: 4 turns
